translated: And be called the Buddha, Tathagata, Arhat, Samyak-sambuddha,
In the great lands of other directions,
Will all go there,
To listen to and accept the Mahayana Mahavibhāṣā.
Therefore, all sentient beings,
If they hear the name of Bodhisattva Akasagarbha,
Make obeisance and make offerings,
will all be reborn in that blissful world.
If there are sentient beings
who seek the Great Vehicle,
but have not attained non-arising,
and uphold this sūtra,
one should know that this person

translated: Great Universal Thoroughly Illuminating Sūtra, Scroll 2 On the twenty-second day of the eleventh month in the tenth year of the Kaihuang era, the lay Buddhist woman Dong Xianfei, who is in good health, bows in respect to the Three Jewels in the ten directions. Now, for her deceased husband Zeng Ya, she has respectfully had this sūtra copied in one scroll and circulated for offerings. She wishes that through the good causes of her deceased husband's soul wandering in the Pure Land, he will be able to directly see the buddhas, forever escape the three evil paths, and transcend the eight difficulties. May he hear the sounds of the Dharma and awaken to the forbearance of wisdom. Together with the six realms, may they all head towards enlightenment.
